XernerxClient.description: Client extender for building the client.

params.description: The guild ID used to globally load commands.
Whether to load commands globally or locally.
An array of prefixes used for message commands.
Whether the bot should listen to messages containing a client mention.
An array of user IDs that are considered owner.
Whether the bot should ignore owner privileges.
A number of milliseconds each command cooldown should be.
A number of seconds for message cache to be deleted.
An array of permissions the user needs to use the commands.
An array of permissions the client needs to use the commands.
True or array with names for logging in the console on login.
